paragraph.paragraph:
Basic text view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/view_editor_feature_icon.png displays the text of the current feature as it is written in the enclosing class. It does not work with
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/40_debugger/20_breakpoints/index.xml breakpoints ; in order to do this the
./10_flat_format.xml flat view has to be used.

Note: This view is not available to .NET features which are imported through by means of an assembly. This is because the assembly .exe or .dll exposes only the interface methods and therefore is no feature implementation to display. The feature interface may be viewed, in a clickable format using the Flat View.
